channel.title: Awk on A Place to Remember
channel.description: Recent content in Awk on A Place to Remember

item.title: My First Time with Awk
item.description: Tonight we’ll talk about Awk. Actually, I’ve know it for a long time but I never had any chance to explore it. A few days ago, I need to remove some duplicate lines from a file BUT it should not be sorted. We can also use sort and uniq, but it will end up sorted before we got an actual result. I’m using this kind of script to remove it:
